column2: officially the Municipality of General Mamerto Natividad (Tagalog: Bayan ng Heneral Mamerto Natividad)
column3: also known as Gen. M. Natividad
column4: is a 4th class municipality in the province of Nueva Ecija

column2: the barrios of Mataas na Kahoy
column26: in the City of Cabanatuan separated from the said city and constituted into a separate and independent municipality known as General Mamerto Natividad.

column1: General Mamerto Natividad is politically subdivided into 20 barangays.
